pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ppc-asmThis package provides allows one to easily modify existing Nintendo GameCube or Wii game executables.## Usage```pythonimport pathlibfrom ppc_asm.dol_file import DolFilefrom ppc_asm.assembler.ppc import *dol_file = DolFile(pathlib.Path("main.dol"))dol_file.set_editable(True)with dol_file: dol_file.write_instructions( 0x800857F0, [ or_(r3, r30, r30), li(r4, 0x29), li(r5, 9999), bl(0x80085760), ] )```
